title: GET_PED_EYE_COLOR
content:
0xA47B860F// GetPedEyeColor
int GET_PED_EYE_COLOR(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: Returns ped's eye colour, or -1 if fails to get.A getter for _SET_PED_EYE_COLOR. Returns -1 if fails to get.Examples:Lualocal pedEyeColour = GetPedEyeColor(PlayerPedId())
if pedEyeColour == 7 then
  print("Gray eyes!")
end
codeBlocks:
local pedEyeColour = GetPedEyeColor(PlayerPedId())
if pedEyeColour == 7 then
  print("Gray eyes!")
end
